summary: Everlasting lightstaff based on Gandalf Lightstaff mod by Tamira, but with a new model.
descriptionHtml:
Staff of Mithrandir

by Kiri Kaeshi

Based off a mod by Tamira: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16112/?


Update 1.1:

Reuploaded archive with correct .nif file



This is an everlasting lightstaff, based on a staff of Mithrandir, Gandalf the Grey, from Lord of the Rings. It can be used like a torch and at the same time it works like a shield. As magical staffs work differently in Middleearth and Tamriel, I found this to be the best compromise. 

You can find it under a Gildergreen tree in Whiterun

Install: Unzip the zip file and copy the meshes, textures and esp to your Skyrim Data folder. Confirm when asked to overwrite (nothing will be overwritten though, this is all new stuff) or to be integrated.

Permissions:

If anyone wishes to reuse model in a different mod (e.g. convert it into a proper magical staff), you're welcome to do so. On request I can provide original 3dsmax and photoshop files.

Credits and thanks:

Tamira for allowing me to use her original mod for which mine is just a model replacement: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16112/?
author: KiriKaeshi
